# currentTime

**Instance Property**

The absolute time, in seconds, to use for scheduling haptic and audio events.

## Declaration

```swift
var currentTime: TimeInterval { get }
```

## Discussion

This time applies to all haptic and audio events sent to and managed by the Core Haptics engine. Use the current time as a way to determine or track the start times of haptic and audio events, created as [doc://com.apple.corehaptics/documentation/CoreHaptics/CHHapticEvent] objects. It corresponds to the [doc://com.apple.corehaptics/documentation/CoreHaptics/CHHapticEvent/relativeTime] and [doc://com.apple.corehaptics/documentation/CoreHaptics/CHHapticEvent/duration] properties of haptic events.



## Getting the Current Media Time

- **CHHapticTimeImmediate**: A time constant used to schedule a command immediately.
